meanings.definition: Torridest: superlative form of torrid, meaning most intensely hot or passionate.
meanings.sent1: The desert had the torridest heat I had ever felt.
meanings.sent2: Their torridest love burned brightly in their eyes.
meanings.sent3: The torridest debate over ice cream flavors was surprisingly intense.
meanings.sent4: Her torridest anger was like a blazing fire, consuming everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The torridest summer day made the asphalt shimmer like a mirage.
